document.full_text: brazil will apply non-tariff trade barriers on cars in an effort to protect domestic manufacturers, the government said on thursday, in a new example of escalating protectionism in south america.
document.title: brazil to slap barriers on car imports
lines_and_colors: brazil will apply non-tariff trade barriers on cars in an effort to protect domestic manufacturers, the government said on thursday, in a new example of escalating protectionism in south america.
